title: .Net Developer (REMOTE) NEW!
full_description: Our client is looking for 2 .NET Developer - FULLY REMOTE - to join their growing team. The .NET Developer help with implementing enterprise web applications using API-driven .NET technologies (C# / JavaScript / SQL Server ) to deliver products as part of ongoing business initiatives. They will also support existing large .NET applications - Assisting in implementing ways to improve the level of customer service, quality, and efficiency of the companyRequirements:4+ years of experience as a Software DeveloperA solid understanding of .NET, C#, and API-based web technologies. ASP.NET MVC, JavaScript, and QueryUnix / Linux fluencySignificant Microsoft SQL Server experience is requiredExperience with agile development processesMust be a motivated self-starter adept at working remotely
